title: Pre-existing type errors in dashboard test files
issue: Multiple test files in the dashboard package have type errors unrelated to TKT-023 changes. These include admin-layout-client.test.tsx (30+ errors about missing user properties), agent-stats-client.test.tsx (missing CallLogForStats properties), calls-client.test.tsx (missing CallLogWithRelations properties), and billing-settings-client.test.tsx. These errors existed before TKT-023 and are blocking the monorepo typecheck.
suggestion: Fix test mocks to include all required properties from their interfaces. For admin-layout-client.test.tsx, add organization_id, phone, avatar_url, role, is_platform_admin, and updated_at to user mock objects. For call-related tests, add ring_started_at, answered_at, answer_time_seconds, and disposition_id to mock call log objects.
